title: Teaser for new champ??!(Rajin - Thunder God)
body:
Ok so I noticed a week ago or so, that in summoners rift, on the ground, were small balls of lightning arcs here and there.
Also I heard news of an artwork being leaked of Rajin the thunder god. I didn't believe it at first, but now that I see that animation on the rift, I feel like it maybe true. Especially since we've seen teasers for many of the new champions before they were announced.........Anyone else noticed it?

replies.body: Yeah no. Highly doubt they'd tease both the new champ and WW rework at the same time, and not make the next champion a support after such a long time.
https://youtu.be/y_EBFyY8_Lc

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Lq22Ibbo,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-01-08T22:59:04.590+0000)
>
> https://youtu.be/y_EBFyY8_Lc

Well guess you got a point there. It just seems weird to me that they'd tease two things at once since one is clearly going to be overshadowed by the other in most cases. Also kinda weird that its not a new support (Unless its a lighting support or something) since we havent had a new support in forever.

I agree incompletely. Despite this video, I think this thunder/lightning champion isn't real. No one else has seen this from my understanding, this could easily be a particles bug, and it could easily be edited in. 

Additionally, I might at first give this video some thought, but due to Camille's recent release and WW's super close release, I highly doubt we will get another new champion, unless they're specific to Zaun. But even than, it seems odd. Especially considering that releasing Camille, new WW, AND a new champion within a close time frame not too far from preseason is going to screw with balance.

> [{quoted}](name=Arakadia,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Lq22Ibbo,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-10T00:49:36.567+0000)
>
> I agree incompletely. Despite this video, I think this thunder/lightning champion isn't real. No one else has seen this from my understanding, this could easily be a particles bug, and it could easily be edited in. 
> 
> Additionally, I might at first give this video some thought, but due to Camille's recent release and WW's super close release, I highly doubt we will get another new champion, unless they're specific to Zaun. But even than, it seems odd. Especially considering that releasing Camille, new WW, AND a new champion within a close time frame not too far from preseason is going to screw with balance.

That was what I thought when I saw the video. I also highly doubt any new champion is going to be lighting theme'd since thats sort of Kennens thing.

I 100% guarantee that it's not edited in. You can go to Jensen's stream on twitch from a couple of days ago and you'll see it. I took it from there. Also it did happen quite a few times in many of my games as well. It could however still be a bug. It's just that the leaked artwork of a lightning champ and this so called repetitive bug came so in sync with each other that I couldn't write it off as just some coincidence. Oh well we are going to have to wait and see huh?
I saw that art from the video, and I'ts from Art Station. Its like 10 months old.
OH ok lol, then it must probably be a bug/glitch :)

This isn't smite silly. Although, for like 6 months now me and about 3 friends of mine have seen mini heartseeker ashe auto attacks flying in a straight line, and cover the entire length of the map at random times.
Do you have an images of this? Im curious to see what it looks like.
https://youtu.be/y_EBFyY8_Lc
Ill try to get it next time i see it in game
Ok I did manage to record a video of it....But anyone know how I can post it here?
Youtube?
Yea figured, I posted it here on the page.
Never seen that before, hmm.

There is only One true thunder god. 

https://f.ptcdn.info/594/011/000/1383225893-download-o.jpg

The one.. And only thunder god

If you're all afraid to click it then its simple..

or with respect. 

T.G. Cid.. 

THUNDER GOD CID!!!!

Here you go guys. You can see the arcs in the mid lane when camera moves there....

https://youtu.be/y_EBFyY8_Lc

>

might be a visual bug, it happens i ve seen twtches replace wolves
Might be preparing for mid season, they might be doing a mass rework, bigger then the last one.
Wait....What does a rework have to do with that?

> [{quoted}](name=HotshotGrim,realm=EUNE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Lq22Ibbo,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-01-08T05:05:14.241+0000)
>
> Wait....What does a rework have to do with that?

its means that they might be starting to prepare for a rework for a thunder related champion or just adding new item/event/map, could be a voli rework.
Warwick rework confirmed as thunder god?
isn't he the drum player in smite? that would be an obvious lack or creativity.

> [{quoted}](name=Elfador,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Lq22Ibbo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-08T04:50:41.398+0000)
>
> isn't he the drum player in smite? that would be an obvious lack or creativity.

Yea I agree....Probably not named that but could be a thunder/lightning based champ right?
Yeah maybe not him....But then what are those lighting arcs on the ground?
